name: Blood Bowl III: Season 2
summary: Underworld teams, big consumers of warpstone infusions and mushrooms from the remotest parts, welcome Goblins, Skaven, Trolls, Rat Ogres and Snotlings. These outcasts take their revenge on life by humiliating the richest teams.
